history.post:
Hello O.K! Nice to see more people from East Europe. Oh, I wonder where does one include piece of Holy Cross (around 40.cm) kept in Serbian monastery on MT. Atos, with a crystal made capsul that holds the blood of Christ… It came there after the 1204. as a gift to prince – monk St. Sava, when his brother took the crown from Nicaea.
Anyway, the best description comes from the Antonius of Novgorod…
